resources.string: Automatically copy the content to the clipboard without needing to tap the \"Copy\" button in the notification.
Regex rule %s is temporarily modified due to calendar event %s: %s

Temporarily modify rules based on calendar events, changes are applied temporarily without altering the configuration.

This action must be the first in the workflow, such a workflow will be automatically triggered by an incoming call.

A use case:
  A shift worker works the day shift from 7 AM to 10 AM for two days, then the night shift from 7 PM to 10 PM for the next two days.
  Some rules must be disabled or enabled during working hours.<

A sample setup:
- 1. In the calendar app, create calendar events work for all working hours.
- 2. Create a regex rule.
  description: working
- 3. Create a workflow:
  - Calendar Event
   event title: work
  - Find Rules
   description: working
  - Modify Rules
   config: { \"flags\": 0 } (this will disable the rule)

   (It supports multiple Find Rules and Modify Rules here)
